meanings.definition: An ache or pain in the stomach.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he had terrible stomachaches.
meanings.sent2: She often gets stomachaches when she is nervous.
meanings.sent3: The stomachaches from eating too many sweets made him regret his choices.
meanings.sent4: Her stomachaches were like tiny monsters gnawing at her insides.
meanings.sent5: The sharp stomachaches felt like tiny knives twisting in his belly.

meanings.definition: To experience pain or discomfort in the stomach.
meanings.sent1: He stomachaches after eating spicy food.
meanings.sent2: They stomachache every time they have to give a presentation.
meanings.sent3: She stomachaches whenever she has to wake up early.
meanings.sent4: The team stomachaches before every big game.
meanings.sent5: I stomachache whenever I have to speak in public.
